Name: scprime
Overview:
ScPrime is a cryptocurrency project targeting public cloud services with a blockchain based ecosystem to pay individuals to store data around the globe using smart contracts and cryptographic proofs to ensure accuracy, security and redundancy.

**Setup:**
Command-line is required to configure your storage provider instance.

Open the Unraid terminal and enter: **docker exec -it scprime sh**

**Documentation:**
https://docs.scpri.me/storageproviderindex

**Storage Network Status:**
https://scpri.me/network

**Join the Discord for Help:**
https://discord.gg/W5ePbSd

Docker specific help can be found in the Discord: **#support-other**

@attributes.Name: Metadata
@attributes.Description: Location where metadata is stored including consensus, wallets and file contracts. 100Gb of free space is recommended, SSD preferred.<br>Container Path: /scp-data

@attributes.Name: Port 1
@attributes.Description: Open this port in your firewall and forward to your server.

@attributes.Name: Port 2
@attributes.Description: Open this port in your firewall and forward to your server.

@attributes.Name: Port 3
@attributes.Description: Open this port in your firewall and forward to your server.

@attributes.Name: Wallet Password
@attributes.Description: Enter your password to automatically unlock your wallet when the docker starts.<br><b>NOTE:</b> Your default password is your seed phrase unless changed.

@attributes.Name: Storage
@attributes.Description: Path where shared folders are located.<br>Container Path: /storage
